MarkdownBlockBase.ItemValue:
<properties pageTitle="0cac409e-6543-48c4-95ba-d400f436559e" description="08e56fba-e712-48c5-89a0-d2bb52eb423b" services="service-fabric" documentationCenter=".net" authors="rwike77" manager="timlt" editor=""/>
<tags ms.service="service-fabric" ms.devlang="rest-api" ms.topic="article" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.workload="na" ms.date="08/17/2015" ms.author="ryanwi"/>

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block:
# Deploy the WordCount and upgrade applications $applicationPathWordCount = "C:\Temp\WordCount" $applicationPathUpgrade = "C:\Temp\WordCountUpgrade"
# LOCAL: $imageStoreConnection = "fabric:ImageStore" $cluster = 'localhost:19000'
Connect-ServiceFabricCluster $cluster
Copy-ServiceFabricApplicationPackage -ApplicationPackagePath $applicationPathWordCount -ImageStoreConnectionString $imageStoreConnection Copy-ServiceFabricApplicationPackage -ApplicationPackagePath $applicationPathUpgrade -ImageStoreConnectionString $imageStoreConnection
